snippet.title: Hero Siege 3.0 Launch Trailer 2019
snippet.description:
Hero Siege 3.0 will be available on the 24th of July 2019!

Get the game on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/26...

Hero Siege is a hack n slash action adventure game with rpg and roguelike elements! Gear and build your Hero with the choice of Talents and Items for an outcome you like and annihilate Satan's army of demons and send him back into the depths of hell!
